document.full_text: the drug, yervoy, made by bristol-myers squibb, is the first medication shown to prolong the lives of people with the skin cancer melanoma.
document.title: f.d.a. approves drug to treat melanoma
lines_and_colors: the drug, yervoy, made by bristol-myers squibb, is the first medication shown to prolong the lives of people with the skin cancer melanoma.
